Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Raymond
Reviews.Content: These cables are GREAT! Strong, high quality, perfect for exterior installation, low visibility, easy to work with, specially when stapling 2 together. CCTV video quality is exceptional!I'm a repeat customer & when ever I need CCTV cables, "THESE ARE THE ONES!"

ProductInfo.Features:
Video power extension cable with power supply kit for CCTV security camera DVR system
2 of 50 feet video/power cables in black
2 of 12V 500mA power supplies with 6ft Long Cord 2.1mm Plug
Every video/Power cable connectors has BNC and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 2 of 50 Feet Camera Video Power Extension Cables with 2 of 12V DC 500mA Power Supplies for CCTV DVR Security System CGL
